description: The file contains the main source code for a Flutter-based Tic Tac Toe game, including UI setup, theme configuration, game logic, and widget definitions.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up the MaterialApp theme and home page.

classes.name: TicTacToePage
classes.description: Main game page displaying the game board, status, and controls.

classes.name: _TicTacToePageState
classes.description: State class managing game logic, UI updates, and user interactions for TicTacToePage.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point that runs the Flutter application.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns the application's theme data based on custom color constants.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the MyApp widget, setting up the MaterialApp.

methods.name: handleTap
methods.description: Handles user taps on the game board, updating game state accordingly.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Determines if there's a winner based on current board state.

methods.name: isDraw
methods.description: Checks if the game has resulted in a draw.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the game to the initial state.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for TicTacToePage.

methods.name: _buildTile
methods.description: Builds individual grid tiles, including animations and tap handling.
